help-file.title: "AURA SIGHT"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <self> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Generic
Allows the caster to see auras surrounding living things not visible to the naked eye, as well as invisibility, the presence of life and farsight. The effects bestowed by "Aura Sight" are dependent on the caster's level. All possible effects are bestowed upon reaching 10th circle.
